Malice/ Hellplague:
 
The Hunter Killer knocked the missiles away, the brought his hands behind his head.  There he focused the energy for the attack, then shot his hands forward in front of him and unleashed a massive beam of stun energy on his opponents.
 
Hellplague tried to defend against the attack, but as soon as the energy wave hit her, she was rendered unconscious.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

Blakc Nightmare recovered and shot aganst Malice thw feathered 
missiles.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice:
>  
> Hellplague looked over her shoulder at Blacknightmare as she came 
around.  
> "Hurry and get up!  I can't hold him forever!" she whispered back 
to her sister.
>  
> Malice was almost ready.  Drawing on an old memory, from where 
eluded him, he was powering up a massive stun attack.  Powerful 
enough to knock them out cold for a long while.  Malice regained his 
grin, which made Hellplague worry just a little.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Black Nightmare:
> 
> 
> The femme moaned and sat down  she was trying to remember what had 
> happenedafter she attaked Malice.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Hellplague:
> >  
> > Malice snickered.  One down.  Now he focused on Hellplague.
> > "Your sister didn't do much.  Think you can do better, Master?"
> > He powered up, and prepared for a much more powerful attack.
> >  
> > Hellplague fll back and knelt next to her felled sister.  She 
took 
> a few feathers, and then stood infront of her.
> > "You think she's taken care of, eh?  Are you sure?" she said, 
with 
> a sly grin.
> > Malice lost his grin and focused on powering up his attack.
>
